title: Has ReFi Become a Partnership Theater? | ReFi Recap 01/20
html:
GM GM Regens! It's Trinity from CARBON copy with another weekly roundup of key news and developments in the ReFi ecosystem.

I hope you touched some trees during the weekend. Here's a recap of key happenings last week in the ReFi space, including the regen alphas you missed ğŸ‘‡

Octant Epoch 6 Allocation

Donate to ReFi Projects in the round

Support DeCleanup Network in securing matching funds from the Asia-Based Grant Initiative for DeSci and DAO research with your donations.

Support DeCleanup Network

ğŸ“° Has ReFi become a partnership theater?

ReFi is flooded with partnership and collaboration announcements, but many lack transparency or measurable outcomes, raising questions about their actual impact. While some efforts, like the Regen Coordination, deliver results, others fall short, as there's often no way to track whether proposed synergies materialize. In the latest CARBON Copy newsletter, we explore a way to hold ReFi projects accountable for their collaborations.

Read the CARBON Copy Newsletter
